title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. AA, ch. I, subch. A, pt. 7003 - Security And Supervision
content:

§ 7003.1 - Policy

§ 7003.4 - Supervision of prisoners outside facility housing areas

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. AA, ch. I, subch. A, pt. 7003

Statutory authority: Correction Law, § 45[6], [15]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
